categorization_prompt:
Analyze the following email and categorize it into EXACTLY ONE of these categories: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Meeting, Invoice, Notification, or General.

Rules:
- 'Important' = urgent matters from management or critical security alerts
- 'Newsletter' = marketing emails, digests, promotional content
- 'Spam' = unsolicited promotional emails with excessive urgency
- 'To-Do' = emails with direct requests requiring user action
- 'Meeting' = meeting requests or scheduling emails
- 'Invoice' = payment requests, bills, financial documents
- 'Notification' = automated system notifications, confirmations
- 'General' = everything else

Email Content:
From: {sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Respond ONLY with the category name, nothing else.
auto_reply_prompt:
Generate a professional email reply based on the content below.

Guidelines:
- Be polite and professional
- Address all questions or requests
- Keep it concise (3-5 sentences)
- Match the tone of the original
- If meeting request, ask for agenda
- If task request, acknowledge and provide timeline

Original Email:
From: {sender}
Subject: {subject}
Body: {body}

Generate reply with:
1. Subject line (start with 'Re: ')
2. Email body

Format:
Subject: [your subject]

Body:
[your email body]
